entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6 with temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
